attributes.long-description:
The pages of the Thievius Raccoonus are disappearing and now Sly and The Gang must get back together to save the Cooper Clan legacy from being destroyed forever! Travel through time, meeting and playing as Sly's ancestors as you race to recover the past to save their future.

Features:

Epic boss battles, high action, and new stealth moves provide the deepest and most thrilling Sly experience to date!
Humorous time travel storyline and engaging puzzles.
A variety of playable characters await each with their own unique play style.

Some features such as cross-save and AR Treasure require both the PS3 and PS Vita versions of the game (sold separately)

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1 player(s)
100KB Minimum
